did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: New York State Association of Family and Consumer Sciences records, 1908-2009.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: New York State Association of Family and Consumer Sciences.

did.physdesc: Correspondence, publications, organizational records, financial documents, memoranda, ephemera.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Reports, minutes, resolutions, constitution, bylaws, financial records, correspondence, membership lists, and history of the association; auditors' reports; records of Student Member Section, including budget data, planning guides, national records, handbooks, public relations material, student conventions, and YOUR TIME IS NOW, story of the American Home Economics Association-Student Member Section; membership reports; Board of Directors records; newsletters, programs, memos, annual reports, and records of Southern Tier Chapter; files of the State President of the New York State Home Economics Association, including material on Board activity; records of the Southeast District, N.Y.S.H.E.A.; and correspondence with college chapters. Also, folders from the New York State Future Homemakers of America, 1943-1990. The Association was formally the New York State Home Economics Association.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Reports, minutes, resolutions, constitution, bylaws, financial records, correspondence, membership lists, and history of the association; auditors' reports; records of Student Member Section, including budget data, planning guides, national records, handbooks, public relations material, student conventions, and YOUR TIME IS NOW, story of the American Home Economics Association-Student Member Section; membership reports; Board of Directors records; newsletters, programs, memos, annual reports, and records of Southern Tier Chapter; files of the State President of the New York State Home Economics Association, including material on Board activity; records of the Southeast District, N.Y.S.H.E.A.; and correspondence with college chapters. Also, folders from the New York State Future Homemakers of America, 1943-1990. The Association was formally the New York State Home Economics Association.

controlaccess.corpname: New York State Association of Family and Consumer Sciences.

prefercite.p: New York State Association of Family and Consumer Sciences records, #3410. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

arrangement.head: SERIES LIST
arrangement.p:
Series II. Administrative Records
Boxes 1 and 10

Series III. Meeting and Conference Records, 1927-2009
Boxes 2-5, 10

Series VI. Western District, 1912-2003
Boxes 6 and 10

Series X. Clippings and Photographs, 1941-2002
Boxes 9-10

Series XI. Greater New York State, 1908-1915
Box 11

Series XII. Long Island District (LID), 1960-2009
Boxes 10 and 11
